author: Dana Schaeffer
title: Recovering from COVID-19: ABC’s Bob Woodruff’s son shares his story
description: Longtime ABC News Correspondent Bob Woodruff’s 28 year-old son, Mack, has been diagnosed with COVID-19.
content: Longtime ABC News Correspondent Bob Woodruffs 28 year-old son, Mack, has been diagnosed with COVID-19. He believes he came down with the virus while traveling from Europe to Sydney, Australia, while on a film project. Bob Woodruff spoke to his son Mack, about… [+2559 chars]
